TopicTitle: Two flag collections - international and sci-fi fun (99 total)

Articles.Content:
Moderator, delete the thread please. The impression I had was that in the case of the sci-fi lot, being a non-commercial for fun thing, it would more fall into the same general category as fan art? I freely admit I could be wrong, so just in case go ahead and X it. I'll reassemble it with just the countries and do it properly. Cheers.

Edited June 17, 2015 by NeroWolfe
Oops.

[MOD - As per the Official Add-on Posting Rules, please include a licence for your add-on within the download file, and in the location the user downloads from (such as a forum post or a Curse listing). Thanks]

I'm also a bit concerned about your inclusion of flags from various science fiction franchises, since they would most likely be copyrighted by the TV/film production that created them.
